title: MPC Kinetic IPO repriced to $2.25
text:
Coal seam gas services business MPC Kinetic's initial public offering has been repriced.

As bookrunners Credit Suisse and UBS were scheduled to close the IPO bookbuild on Thursday afternoon, they sent a message to fund managers saying the deal was repriced.

The IPO is now at $2.25 a share, down from $2.50 a share.

The new price represented 5.9-times forecast EBITDA, on an expected 2020 EBITDA to enterprise value basis. It was previously seeking to list on a 6.6-times multiple.

If successful, MPC Kinetic shares will start trading on October 29. Peter Braig

It also values the company at $408.9 million on a market capitalisation basis.
description: Coal seam gas services business MPC Kinetic's initial public offering has been repriced.
